title: Rod Kimble Stuntman Forever!!
description: Rod Kimble’s stunt reel that found life online and precursor to his now infamous 15-bus jump attempt.
altHero: Rod Kimble, a curly haired young man, wearing a stuntman jumpsuit and looking off into the distance
alt1: Rod gritting teeth at the camera with “Danger!!” text above
alt2: Rod riding a motorbike up a plywood ramp to try and jump over a van
alt3: Rod jumping over some orange parking cones with “Training” text below
alt4: Rod on fire at a birthday party
